text: Eva [ ee-vuh ] is a female given name. It is the Latin form of the English name Eve. The name Eve comes from a Hebrew name, meaning "life" or "the living one". In the 1990 United States Census, the name Eva was very popular. Its popularity peaked one year earlier at #31. In 2006, the name ranked at #124. Eva is more common across England and Wales. == People == * Eva Marie Saint, an American movie and stage actress * Eva Gabor, Hungarian-American actress, businesswoman, singer, and socialite (1919â€“1995) * Eva Longoria, American actress and producer (born 1975) ==References== Category:Given names
title: Eva (name)
